name: Media Pundit
short_description: Media Pundit is a Multi-Platform (Eclipse) Catalogue, Database tool for Media Files such as Songs, Movies, Videos, Blogs...anything under the sun written in Java. It has Multi Database support via JDBC-ODBC and features ID tag editing, Caching
